creditline: The Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas and gift of Robert T. Coffland in memory of Mary Hunt Kahlenberg
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: irregular rectangular panel; cream colored; decorated with thin black lines in curving forms with X and star forms, circles with stars and rings on dots, dots parallel to lines, and zigzag in one corner
title: Barkcloth panel
